claim_card.claim: A cross-domain mapping is proposed: coherence funnels and saturation horizons (I=I*) correspond to market/institution saturation (J=J*), beyond which extraction destabilizes alignment.
claim_card.test_hook: Define an empirical proxy J(t) for institutional/market alignment intensity; test for saturation plateaus and instability beyond them.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Economic Horizon: At some point, J reaches J* and diffusion shuts down ... further extraction destabilizes the system.
